definition: (after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: The latter release turned out to be the most popular among filesharers.
sentences.chinese: 而后者就是在文件共享者中传播的最广泛的一个版本。

sentences.english: Clearly this was a profitable happenstance for both the owners and the king.
sentences.chinese: 显然后者对于农场主和国王来说都是收益颇丰的惊喜。

sentences.english: It needs land, so absorbing Chaohu will benefit Hefei.
sentences.chinese: 因此，将巢湖的土地并入合肥对后者的发展有利。

sentences.english: The latter will move back, watching to the Englishman.
sentences.chinese: 后者将回迁，看向英国人。

sentences.english: On the contrary, the latter expresses sex by way of love.
sentences.chinese: 后者通过情来表达性，其状态反之。

sentences.english: Dealing with the latter can be anguishing and taxing.
sentences.chinese: 与后者打交道会让人心力交瘁，痛苦不堪。

sentences.english: In overall consideration, we prefer the later with cost-efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 综合考虑，大家选择了更经济的后者。

sentences.english: They keep horses and cattle, the former for riding, the latter for food.
sentences.chinese: 他们养着马和牛，前者供乘骑，后者供食用。

sentences.english: Root is diarch, the diameter lesser than A. obliterata.
sentences.chinese: 根为二原型，直径比后者略小些。

sentences.english: As for me, I agree with the latter opinion.
sentences.chinese: 就我看采，我同意后者的意见。

sentences.english: We chose the latter for demonstration purposes for the article.
sentences.chinese: 基于本文的演示目的，我们选择了后者。

sentences.english: I like the latter approach for creating VOB containers that store similar types of artifacts.
sentences.chinese: 我倾向于后者来建立存储相似类型工件的VOB容器。

sentences.english: He picked out Wazza, and he stretched his leg out and managed to guide it past the keeper.
sentences.chinese: 他将球挑给鲁尼，后者伸长了腿，让球越过了门将。

sentences.english: Of pigs and cows, the latter (=the cows) are more valuable.
sentences.chinese: 猪牛两种动物中，后者较有价值。

sentences.english: The latter is defined as processes which are sleeping at a non- interruptible level.
sentences.chinese: 后者的定义是处于非可中断级别睡眠状态的进程。

sentences.english: The latter one formed as sulfides and gossan.
sentences.chinese: 后者系岩体与地层接触，形成硫化物或铁帽。

definition: (conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
to turn to (sth else)/to switch to
in fact/in reality/as a matter of fact/in practice
in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
